trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件，你必须首先设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To control the actions programmatically that are performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的操作以编程方式，当回发时，执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>是单击，提供的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property stores a string that is associated with the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object when clicked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>属性存储的行为与相关联的字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象时单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This string is passed in the ImageMapEventArgs event data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在 ImageMapEventArgs 事件数据中传递此字符串时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>的新实例

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>的实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>|The string assigned to the `value` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>|分配给字符串`value`参数。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> object assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>对象分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>被单击的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.String>分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>被单击的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>被单击的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
